description: Giant hyssop (Agastache 'Ava') is a beautiful and unique addition to any garden. It is an upright, clump-forming perennial with aromatic, silvery leaves, and spikes of lavender or pink flowers that bloom from early summer to fall. The blooms attract butterflies and hummingbirds, and the aromatic foliage has a licorice-mint scent. Great for mass planting, it stands strong and tall in any garden. Its semi-evergreen foliage adds texture to the garden and a brilliant display of bright colors from late spring through early fall. Its hardy nature and ease of care makes it an ideal choice for beginner gardeners. The Giant Hyssop (Agastache 'Ava') is truly a magnificent and spectacular sight.
